## Upcoming Events

### Walk, Bike & Roll to School Day {#walk-bike-roll}

**Date:** Wednesday, May 7, 2025  
**Time:** 7:30 AM - 8:15 AM  
**Location:** Multiple starting points throughout Monrovia

Join us for our city-wide Walk, Bike & Roll to School Day! 

#### Meeting Points:
- **E Olive & S Ivy**: 7:30 AM (for students attending Monroe Mayflower)

Adult volunteers will lead groups from each meeting point to the appropriate schools. 

:::{.callout-tip}
## Volunteer Opportunity
We need adult volunteers to help lead student groups and assist with safety. [Sign up here](#) to volunteer.
:::

### Monrovia Days Parade {#monrovia-days}

**Date:** Thursday, May 15, 2025  
**Time:** Parade starts at 7:00 PM 

We'll be participating in the annual Monrovia Days Parade with a decorated bike procession! Bring your bike and help us showcase active transportation in our community.

#### Participation Details:
- Decorate your bike with streamers, signs, or flowers (we'll have some supplies available)
- Wear fun clothes or bright colors
- All ages welcome (children under 12 must be accompanied by an adult)
- The route is approximately 1 mile long

:::{.callout-important}
## Registration Required
Please [register here](#) by May 10th if you plan to join our parade contingent.
:::
